name: Mech Fighter
description:
CONTROLLERS RECOMMENDED BUT NOT REQUIRED

Take control of a malfunctioning mech to overcome your opponent. Fix jams, repair body parts, and try not to overheat your mech while also fighting against another pilot trying to do the same. 

NOTE: If you want to play with another friend that isn't local, try using Parsec. I used it to playtest my game with my friend. 

Credits:

Programmer - Animator - Artist - Stressed Guy - Eric V Lopez

Tester - Chris Princler

Sounds: Freesound.org Ost : Rumble by Benjamin Tissot (freemusicarchive.org)

Developer's Note: I feel this game is an example of focusing too much on certain aspects of development. Still, I hope people will enjoy the idea even with all the bugs that plagues it.
